title: PROJECT YASUO BEING PUSHED ASIDE
body: The new PROJECT skins have jsut come out, now YASUO is the original PROJECT skin. So why does he not get a SUMMONER ICON or cool art thing in the game loading screen. RIOT made a WHOLE team for PROJECT but yasuo isnt a part of it... WHY?!?! I main PROJECT YASUO and I am very upset that he is getting completely ignored. RIOT.... PLEASE RESPOND

replies.body: Dude Leona is part of the new line-up and she didn't even make it into the promotional video. Assassin favouring and support disservice is the real issue with the new skins.
He's not getting ignored, his skin is actually on sale for 600 RP which I bought :) also it's all part of promoting the new skins.
its a skin not a champ if they wear trying to get rid of yas then yes gj you got riot but no its a skin
Is a leaf's only purpose to fall?
